text: Shut Up & Sit Down (SUSD) is a board game review website. It also has a YouTube channel. It is created by Quintin Smith, Matt Lees, and Tom Brewster. The channel had Paul Dean as a member. It has featured Ava Foxfort, Brendan Caldwell and Philippa Warr of Rock Paper Shotgun. It also has features from Emily from Emily and Things. ==References== Category:Board games
title: Shut Up & Sit Down
